data.name: Chat_VA_Airlock
data.value: Simulationen haben ergeben, dass die Wahrscheinlichkeit eines Unfalls nur 2% beträgt.

data.name: Chat_VA_AttackWarning
data.value: Engineer, your ship has been critically damaged. This will look bad on your report.

data.name: Chat_VA_AttackWarningpart2
data.value: Emergency evacuation recommended, original mission terminated.

data.name: Chat_VA_AttackWarningpart3
data.value: Quickest route to escape pods marked with GPS.

data.name: Chat_VA_BreachDetected
data.value: Sorry I can't override the safeguards, this stations system cannot be reasoned with.

data.name: Chat_VA_BridgeInfo1
data.value: Docking to station is in progress.

data.name: Chat_VA_BridgeInfo2
data.value: The station isn't responding to communications.

data.name: Chat_VA_BridgeInfo3
data.value: Manual exploration is required to determine what happened here.

data.name: Chat_VA_CommandCenter
data.value: Station designs indicate the command center should be on the upper floor.

data.name: Chat_VA_DoorDamaged
data.value: This door apears damaged. You can fix it using the tools scattered around.

data.name: Chat_VA_EnergyLoss
data.value: Warning, suit malfunction detected. Energy level is dropping.

data.name: Chat_VA_EnergyStabilize
data.value: Suit malfunction repaired. Visiting recharge station is recommended.

data.name: Chat_VA_EnterEscapePod
data.value: Enter the seat to Evacuate the station.

data.name: Chat_VA_EnterTheStation
data.value: Proceed with caution, falling off the station will result in a negative Engineer performance report.

data.name: Chat_VA_GetOxygenBottle
data.value: Engineer, remember to breathe oxygen. Oxygen is essential to astronaut performance.

data.name: Chat_VA_GoToTheAirlock
data.value: Engineer, prepare to disembark and commence station investigation.

data.name: Chat_VA_GoToTheBridge
data.value: Please go to ship bridge for briefing.

data.name: Chat_VA_Helmet
data.value: Warning, movement outside of pressurized enviroment without helmet is not recommended.

data.name: Chat_VA_Introduction
data.value: Virtual Engineer Assistant activated.

data.name: Chat_VA_Outro
data.value: Reports of conflict confirmed, R.O.S. station has been attacked and destroyed by an unknown group. Engineer ship destroyed, evacuating to moon surface.

data.name: Chat_VA_StartExploring
data.value: Ship auto pilot engaged, moving to safe distance.

data.name: Chat_VA_UseRedPanel
data.value: The station is reporting heavy damage to systems.

data.name: Chat_VA_WakeUp
data.value: Starting the Cryochamber thawing procedure.

data.value: Distance: {0}m

data.value: Locked to station

data.value: Room oxygen: {0}%

data.value: preparing for pressurization...

data.value: Room is pressurized.

data.name: Notification_Intro
data.value: Ship Autolog - Approaching Destination. Travel Duration 576 Earth Hours. Initiating Engineer Resuscitation Procedure...

data.name: Quest01_Cryo
data.value: Leave the Cryo Chamber

data.name: Quest01_Cryo_UseKey
data.value: Exit the Cryo Chamber by pressing the [ {0} ] key.

data.name: Quest02_Movement
data.value: Report to the Ship's Bridge

data.name: Quest02_Movement_Door
data.value: Look at the door and press [ {0} ] to open / close.

data.name: Quest02_Movement_GPS
data.value: Follow the GPS marker for help with navigation.

data.name: Quest02_Movement_Keys
data.value: Use the [ {0} ], [ {1} ], [ {2} ], [ {3} ] keys to move.

data.name: Quest02_Movement_Mouse
data.value: Use the mouse to look around.

data.name: Quest03_GoToAirlock
data.value: Go to the Ship's Airlock.

data.name: Quest03_GoToAirlock_Doors
data.value: Press [ {0} ] to open / close doors.

data.name: Quest03_GoToAirlock_Navigation
data.value: Go to the Airlock located on the lower deck

data.name: Quest04B_Helmet
data.value: Open the airlock

data.name: Quest04B_Helmet_RedPanel
data.value: Open the hangar doors with the port button panel.

data.name: Quest04B_Helmet_toggle
data.value: Toggle your helmet by pressing [ {0} ] key

data.name: Quest04_Equipment
data.value: Acquire Personal Oxygen Supplies

data.name: Quest04_Equipment_Button
data.value: Use the starboard button panel to dispense a new oxygen bottle.

data.name: Quest04_Equipment_PickUp
data.value: Pick up objects by looking at them and pressing the [ {0} ] key.

data.name: Quest04_Equipment_UseKey
data.value: Press [ {0} ] to activate buttons on a button panel.

data.name: Quest05_EnterStation
data.value: Board the Station

data.name: Quest05_EnterStation_Airlock
data.value: Proceed to station airlock.

data.name: Quest05_EnterStation_AirlockButton
data.value: Use the button panel to cycle the airlock.

data.name: Quest05_EnterStation_Caution
data.value: Station airlock coordinates updated.

data.name: Quest06_Explore
data.value: Locate the Stations Command Center

data.name: Quest06_ExplorePartOne_Crouch
data.value: Press [ {0} ] to crouch.

data.name: Quest06_ExplorePartOne_Search
data.value: Get to the command center by following GPS waypoints

data.name: Quest07_Breach
data.value: Repressurize the Life Support Room.

data.name: Quest07_Breach_Intro
data.value: Major hull breach detected.

data.name: Quest07_Breach_Intro2
data.value: Station safeguards won't allow doors to open until pressurization is restored.

data.name: Quest07_Breach_Intro3
data.value: Investigate the nearby button panel to attempt closing the ceiling blast doors.

data.name: Quest07_Breach_Pressurizing
data.value: Pressurization in progress. Standby.

data.name: Quest08_ExplorePartTwo_Intro
data.value: Safeguard doors are opening, continue to the command center.

data.name: Quest09_DamagedDoor
data.value: Repair Damaged Door

data.name: Quest09_DamagedDoor_Energy
data.value: Recharge energy at medical bay (hold [ {0} ] key)

data.name: Quest09_DamagedDoor_PickUpComponents
data.value: Pick up all higlighted items ([ {0} ] key).

data.name: Quest09_DamagedDoor_PickUpMotors
data.value: Components picked up: {0}/{1}

data.name: Quest09_DamagedDoor_PickUpWelder
data.value: Look at an item and press [ {0} ] to pick it up.

data.name: Quest09_DamagedDoor_Repair
data.value: Approach the door and hold left mouse button to start welding.

data.name: Quest10_ExplorePartThree_Intro
data.value: Continue to the command center located nearby.

data.name: Quest10_ExplorePartThree_IntroPart2
data.value: The Command Center is close.

data.value: Evacuate the Station Immediately

data.value: The station is under attack by unknown assailants.

data.name: Quest11_Attacked_Sprint
data.value: Sprint by holding [ {0} ] key

data.value: Navigate through the damaged corridor

data.name: Quest12_Jumping_Gaps
data.value: You will have to jump over the breaks in this corridor.

data.value: Use [ {0} ] key to jump over gaps.
